subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The United States Tennis Association plans to have a roof over Ashe Stadium by 2016 or 2017 and one on a new 15,000-seat Armstrong Stadium by 2018.
snippet: The United States Tennis Association plans to have a roof over Ashe Stadium by 2016 or 2017 and one on a new 15,000-seat Armstrong Stadium by 2018.
